message.raw: Added an assert (from patch 1557801) for a very common composite mass problem encountered by new users - centre of mass must be at the body origin. (Use dMassTranslate( mass, -mass->c ) to correct it). Note that at some point in the future, ODE will support offset masses, until that time it'll save a lot of people time if it asserts about it (and hopefully may spur on development of offset masses!)
